Source: http://traces.cs.umass.edu/index.php/Smart/Smart (UMass Trace Repository -> UMass Smart* Dataset - 2017 release -> Apartment dataset)

US holidays used for flagging dates:
2015: 2015-01-01,2015-01-19,2015-02-16,2015-04-16,2015-05-10,2015-05-25,2015-06-21,2015-07-03,2015-09-07,2015-10-12,2015-11-11,2015-11-26,2015-11-27,2015-12-24,2015-12-25,2015-12-31
2016: 2016-01-01,2016-01-18,2016-02-15,2016-04-15,2016-05-08,2016-05-30,2016-06-19,2016-07-04,2016-09-05,2016-10-10,2016-11-11,2016-11-24,2016-11-25,2016-12-24,2016-12-25,2016-12-31
